Description: South Boston... East 4th Street 2-bedroom/2-bathroom duplex. Top floors of a converted schoolhouse building. Open kitchen and living room and bathrooms. Equal Size Bedrooms, one on the upper level loft with an en-suite bathroom. High Ceilings. Laundry in building. Water and sewer included. Central Air. Available 9/1 $3000 Steps from the Red Line, Seaport, Broadway restaurants and shops. Great value for South Boston!! Updated pictures coming soon
